dcterms:creator: Y. LeCun
C. Cortes
C. Burges
dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset consists of a collection of hand-written digits, commonly used for training various image processing systems. In this paper, it is utilized to evaluate the performance of the proposed average margin regularization method in a binary classification task.
dcterms:title: MNIST Dataset

dcterms:description: Synthetic data generated for the experiments in the paper, used to empirically demonstrate the effectiveness of the average margin regularization method.
dcterms:title: Synthetic Data
